Computer.name: H4ck's Battlestation
Computer.file: (h4ck): hey dude i've sent u the password for the server (h1ll3r): wait, it's encrypted, how am i supposed to know the password? (h4ck): wat? you don't have the decypher? omg dude. (h1ll3r): i'm just starting out being a hacker okay? (h4ck): dude, once you get decypher ill tell you the password lol (h1ll3r): aw come on dont be like that (h4ck): sorry dude. #BINARY#
reminder, all my encrypted files's passwords are "spooky"
